attributes.action: To keep our social networking data private, not on a government database!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was reported that the British Government wants to take the details of Britains from social networking sites like facebook! We want our data left alone not on a Government database to be lost on a train!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
